Literature.Title: Aurilides B and C, cancer cell toxins from a Papua New Guinea collection of the marine cyanobacterium Lyngbya majuscula
Literature.Author: Han B, Gross H, Goeger DE, Mooberry SL, Gerwick WH

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Mouse neuroblastoma cells N2a(LC50=0.01µM),Human lung carcinoma NCI-H460(LC50=0.04µM),Human myelogenous leukemia K562(IC50=<0.01µM),Human lymphoblastic leukemia Molt-4(IC50=<0.01µM),Human lung carcinoma A549(IC50=<0.01µM),Human lung adenocarcinoma NCI-H23(IC50=<0.01µM),Human colon adenocarcinoma HCT 116(IC50=<0.01µM),Human glioblastoma U251-MG(IC50=<0.01µM),Human Astrocytoma SF-268(IC50=<0.01µM),Human skin melanoma SK-MEL-2(IC50=<0.01µM),Human ovarian adenocarcinoma IGROV1(IC50=<0.01µM),Human renal adenocarcinoma ACHN(IC50=<0.01µM),Human prostate adenocarcinoma PC-3(IC50=<0.01µM),Human breast adenocarcinoma MCF-7(IC50=<0.01µM),Human breast adenocarcinoma MDA-MB-231(IC50=<0.01µM)
